title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 85.4 - Criminal penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 85.4 - Criminal penalties

State Regulations

For criminal penalties, see article 37 of the Tax Law. Such penalties are in addition to any applicable civil penalties described in
this Title and any applicable penalties provided for in the Penal Law or
elsewhere. (See Part 78 of this Title for additional civil
penalties.)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
85.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
